name: Merrell Chameleon 7 Access Mid A/C Waterproof Shoes - Children to Youths
categories: Chameleon 7 Access Mid A/C Waterproof Shoes
description: Finding the perfect marshmallow stick can take all day. This kid-sized version of the adult Chameleon stands up to the rigours of camp life and hiking trips with no compromises. Leather and mesh balance durability, breathability and weight, and a waterproof membrane keeps feet dry no matter what the trail throws at them. A hook-and-loop closure makes them easy to get on and off, and rugged outsoles offer grip on rocky, rooty or muddy terrain.Durable leather and mesh upper breathes to keep little feet comfortable.Waterproof membrane keeps feet dry in less-than-ideal trail conditions.Hook-and-loop closure makes for quick adjustability and easy on and off.Non-marking M Select™ GRIP outsole provides traction on both wet and dry surfaces.
